application-ref-numbers.header: Do you have the GWF, HO or IHS reference number(s)?

reference-numbers.header: Which reference numbers do you have? Select all that apply

items: A GWF number is given after you apply for a visa outside the UK.
An HO number is given after you apply within the UK.
An IHS number is given when you pay your immigration health surcharge.
